alert.note: Alert for Aguada; Aguadilla; Camuy; Isabela; Moca; Quebradillas; Rincon (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 4:56PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aguada, Aguadilla, Camuy, Isabela, Moca, Quebradillas and Rincon. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 356 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Isabela, Moca, Quebradillas, Aguadilla, Aguada, Camuy, Rincon, Aceitunas, Hato Arriba, Caban, Luyando, San Antonio, Mora, Rafael Hernandez, Cacao, Piedra Gorda, Quebrada and Stella. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Aguada; Aguadilla; Camuy; Isabela; Moca; Quebradillas; Rincon
